Articles.Content:
I have ran into a bug where the throttle has a mind of its own... being unresponsive at times(stuck to zero) and trying to set itself to zero. It started to happen randomly mid-career, I have no idea what's causing it, besides that it's most likely a mod (a lot of suspects to choose from). 

I'm running KSP with the following mods(everything has been updated/patched to the latest release)

![Mods_zpspuev4vac.png](http://i1119.photobucket.com/albums/k633/taniel0401/Mods_zpspuev4vac.png)
What you tell, seems the "prevent overheating" from MechJeb. If you enabled it one time, it will stay enabled in persistence.

> 
> What you tell, seems the "prevent overheating" from MechJeb. If you enabled it one time, it will stay enabled in persistence.

How do I disable that?
